errors.invalid_token: Access token is invalid or missing.
errors.token_expired: Access token has expired. Please sign in again.
errors.invalid_device_code: The provided device code is not valid.
errors.expired_token: The device authorization code has expired.
errors.registration_required: WebAuthn registration is required. Please register your security key.
errors.invalid_user_code: The provided user code is not valid.
errors.authorization_pending: Authorization is pending. Confirm the request to continue.
errors.invalid_refresh_token: Refresh token is invalid or has been revoked.
errors.hub_not_registered: The specified hub is not registered for this owner.
errors.certificate_issue_failed: Failed to issue certificate. Check certificate request details.
errors.unauthorized: Operation requires a valid root token.
errors.invalid_bootstrap_token: Bootstrap token is invalid or has expired.
errors.hub_certificate_required: Hub client certificate is required for this request.
errors.subnet_certificate_mismatch: Provided subnet identifier does not match the client certificate.
errors.subnet_required_with_bootstrap: Subnet identifier is required when using a bootstrap token.
errors.invalid_client_certificate: Client certificate is invalid or missing attributes.
errors.node_certificate_required: Node client certificate is required for this operation.
errors.node_mismatch: Node identifier does not match the authenticated certificate.
errors.invalid_archive_encoding: Archive payload is not valid base64 data.
errors.sha256_mismatch: Archive checksum does not match the provided SHA256.
errors.archive_fields_required: Archive name and payload are required.
errors.archive_too_large: Archive payload exceeds the allowed size.
errors.invalid_archive: Archive payload is invalid or corrupted.
errors.name_and_node_required: Draft name and node identifier are required.
errors.bootstrap_csr_required: CSR PEM must be provided for bootstrap enrollment.
errors.internal_error: Unexpected server error. Check backend logs.
